review.user_review: Frontier has never let me down in any of the spices I have ordered.  All of them are delivered fresh and quickly in resealable dark bags for longer freshness and flavor.  That being said, I would love to recommend Turmeric for many, many other reasons.  If you don't know the health benefits of Turmeric, please take a few moments to research them as there are many.  I use Turmeric for its anti inflammation properties and anti cancer properties.  It is helpful in weight loss and brain function as well as energy.  Currently I am using it in my dogs food daily.  He is an 11 year old French Bulldog who we just adopted from a shelter.  He came to us with seizures but now has a tumor growing on his mouth.  His doctor says at this point there isn't much we can do as it is most likely brain cancer.  After a few hours of crying I researched Turmeric and dogs and found that many tumors have been reduced by adding a Tbs. or more in their food daily.  I've been doing it for about a week and is really does look much better.  Knock on wood this will help him.  I've been drinking Turmeric in my water with cayenne pepper, ginger, lemon juice and aloe vera for quite a while and I've never felt better.  I use it to keep my hands pain free.  I am a massage therapist who does deep tissue and I really have to keep inflammation out of my body.  Great product, great price and phenomenal company to purchase from.

description: We get serious about quality. In Rajasthan, India, Swani Spice Mills ‚Äî one of our partners in our sustainable sourcing program ‚Äî works with 250 farmers across several villages to produce high quality, organic cumin seed. But, if organically grown seeds come into contact with pesticide-contaminated equipment used by hired local processors, the farmers‚Äô efforts may be for naught. We helped Swani Spice buy two dedicated threshing machines built specifically to process cumin. Now, the farmers pay a third of what they previously paid for threshing. And you get pure, clean, great-tasting cumin you can feel good about. Best Uses: This is a must-have spice for Middle Eastern, North African, Mexican and Indian dishes. review.user_review:
I love this projector! It is very compact and super simple to use and set up. All of the ports are simple to get too and all of the buttons, start, lamp, menu, home, etc. are on the face top. I easily connected my BluRay player and my sound bar to watch a great movie with friends. The color was amazing and even though the room wasn't pitch black, the picture quality was perfect and everyone could easily see the picture. The 3000 lumens Color Brightness and the 3000 White Brightness worked beautifully in a semi dark room. I imagine in a dark room it is even more spectacular. I do wish that this projector was equipped with an internal dvd player, but being so simple to set up the bluray player and my laptop, it isn't that much of a drag at all. I did play around with the image adjustments and found them also easy to use.
Honesly, this really is a plug and play theater system as well as a plug and play office projector. It is so lightweight that carrying it from room to room and setting up to the office computer/laptop for display was quick. I did a presentation for a group of people with this projector during the day...perfect.
Right now, I am using it consistently as a home theater. I have it set up to my Soundbar, my BluRay player and a screen that comes down from ceiling. I'm planning on hosting a football party using this projector and my laptop and of course, Sunday Ticket! Hopefully I win my fantasy football that day! Seriously, this is an all around perfect projector for home or office, inside or outside. Perfect!

There is also a remote that does everything from wherever you are. Love that. There is also telephone and internet support services if needed. So there are no worries at all if you have any problems with set up.

review.user_review_title: Easy, Instant upgrade for netbooks/mini notebooks
review.user_review: This is an easy, painless upgrade for any mini notebook or netbook that comes with only a factory 1G ram.  I was able to intstall the 2G within less than 5 minutes and almost immediately after opening my Asus PC Eee 1000HA.  The trick to upgrading the memory on the Asus is you MUST go into Bios and turn off the original 1G then updated to 2G then go to Bios again to turn on what you just turned off before rebooting computer.  Sounds complicated...it isn't.  I actually went onto YouTube, searched for "upgrade Asus to 2G" found a step by step video, followed it and Poof....DONE!  Easy, simple and it works.  Save time and check out the videos before adding gig.  It is really simple, pops out and pops in.  Faster memory in the blink of an eye.

Every module undergoes Kingston's rigorous quality assurance process and every cell on every chip on every module is fully tested and verified to be defect-free.
Why Choose Kingston?

Kingston Technology Company, Inc., offers a wide range of computer memory and Flash products plus all the services to support your memory needs. Founded in 1987, Kingston is committed to providing its customers with the best memory products for the latest and most requested technologies.

When you order Kingston memory, you get quality components, engineering expertise, 100-percent testing, free 24/7 technical support, and a lifetime warranty. Best of all, Kingston memory is backed by the legendary reliability that has made the company the world's independent memory leader.
DRAM Advantage

All incoming DRAM chips are scrutinized to ensure that only premium, qualified and tested DRAM is accepted into the manufacturing process. When you buy ValueRAM, you benefit from the relationships Kingston has developed over the years with multiple DRAM chip manufacturers. As a leading DRAM buyer, Kingston receives excellent supplier support, which results in outstanding availability for customers and gives Kingston the unique distinction of offering a wide variety of memory.
Lifetime Warranty
All Kingston memory products are backed by a lifetime warranty, free technical support and legendary Kingston reliability.
Which Kingston Memory Device is Right for You?

review.user_review: I LOVE this watch!  When I first opened the watch case I was totally enamored by its beauty and elegance.  It is a gift for my son who just graduated college so I really, really wanted something spectacular for him to wear, yet have a young and unique look and feel as well.  This watch hits all of my desires perfectly!  The watch face is large which is perfect for my son's wrist.  He is a rather large boy, football player sized, so this watch doesn't get lost at all on him.  The face has very, very cool clock cogs in the center surrounded by the gorgeous gold numbers.  The leather band sets with the gold and black of the face perfectly.  This watch is really that incredible.  Breathtaking, actually.  I would very much recommend this to any male for any occasion.  It is classy, hip and rich looking.  You won't regret owning this watch!

description: Lucien Piccard has been handcrafting fine timepieces for generations. Founded in 1923 in Switzerland, Lucien Piccard timepieces have adorned royalty, dignitaries and celebrities worldwide.
Lucien Piccard pioneered the use of gemstones on watches and was among the first to bring the world slim-line watch designs.

With this heritage and a reputation for impeccable design and high quality at affordable prices, Lucien Piccard remains one of the few watch companies to offer a limited five year warranty; a long standing policy which has earned the company notoriety and distinction over the decades.

The legacy of Lucien Piccard timepieces continues to be fashionable marrying tradition with modern watch technology. Materials such as 14 and 18 karat gold, stainless steel, diamonds and other precious stones are incorporated into many of the LP styles making stylish, quality timepieces within reach of almost any customer.
Created in a blend of fashion and class, this Lucien Piccard timepiece exhibits a bold style that adds flare to your collection.

review.user_review_title: Great camera is you need an extreme wide angle
review.user_review:
Pros:
-Extreme wide angle camera, it covers a lot of space
-Night vision and sound capture are good and comparable to similarly priced cameras.
-Easy to setup on my network. Took less than a few min.
-Several different camera viewing options fisheye, panorama, etc.
- 7 day cloud recording costs $59 per year or $5.99 a month. I‚Äôve seen less and more from other vendors.
- You can record to a micro SD card, not provide.
- Come with long 9.5 foot usb power cable.

Cons:
- Fisheye or wide angle lens may be good for capturing a large area but it also distorts the image.
- When zooming in with this camera the image is extremely washed out a pixalated. I may need to play around with it some more to figure out why. My connection is perfect and the setting was set at ultra HD. I see much better zoom in clarity with my Motorola (Hubble) and Canary cameras.
- I would prefer more cloud options. 1 day recording for $30 a year.
- Not a lot of mounting options. There is one flat bracket. I haven‚Äôt check their site to see if they make a swivel bracket.

Overall all a good option if you need an extremely wide angle camera, and I‚Äôm talking very extreme. The only reason I‚Äôm not giving 5 stars is because of zoom on clarity and they may be due to the extreme wide angle.

description: Put yourself in the center of any room with ez360 Pano's 360¬∞ panoramic view, crisp 3MP HDR Video, and full duplex two-way audio.
"Alexa Show me the Living Room"
With the EZVIZ skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your ez360 PANO using your voice through Echo Show and Echo Dot.
View
3MP STARVIS back illuminated image sensor with HDR and a fisheye lens gives you crystal clear complete full room coverage when mounted on a wall or ceiling.
Placement

- Ceiling placement is recommended when a suspended ceiling is present with an available power socket above. - Wall placement at eye-level near an available power socket is recommended when a suspended ceiling is not available.
*For maximum coverage, place camera in the center of the ceiling or at eye-level on a wall nearest to the center of the room.
Multiple Storage Options

(1) Local storage up to 128GB MicroSD card to save video. - Motion Detection and manual recording only. (2) EZVIZ Vault PLUS (Wi-Fi NVR) enables 24/7 recording and motion detection zones. (3) 7-day and 30-day cloud storage options, with free 30 day trial. - Stores data in the cloud for ultimate protection.
Connectivity Requirements
High-Speed Internet Connection (1.5Mbps+) Mobile OS: iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+ Wi-Fi 2.4/5.0 GHz (802.11 b/g/n)
Setup

(1) Download EZVIZ app on iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+. (2) Power on the camera and wait for ready mode (Alternating blue and red light) (3) Create an account and follow easy and quick setup steps in app.
*Please ensure to update your device firmware from the EZVIZ APP upon initial setup and check back regularly for future updates.
ALEXA Skills Setup

(1) Select the ‚ÄúEnable Skill‚Äù button in the Alexa APP to link your EZVIZ account and discover your device. (2) Select a suitable name for your camera in the EZVIZ APP. (3) Discover your camera in the Alexa APP.
*Image Encryption must be turned off from your camera settings in the EZVIZ APP to properly connect with Alexa.
Packaging Contents
1 x ez360 Pano 1 x Mounting Bracket 1 x Mounting Accessories 1 x 10ft Power Cable 1 x Quick Start Guide

description: Product Description

The My Net N750 HD Dual-Band Router accelerates video, gaming and chat. WD's exclusive FasTrack technology delivers smooth, simultaneous HD streams with combined wireless speeds up to 750 Mbps. Simple setup, 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2 USB ports and superior range for larger homes
Amazon.com
From the Manufacturer
My Net N750 HD Dual-Band Router ‚Äì Seamless HD streaming.

My Net N750 HD Dual-Band Router delivers seamless HD streaming for video, games and chat. This high-performance router features exclusive FasTrack technology to prioritize entertainment streams, combined wireless speeds up to 750 Mbps, simple setup, 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports and 2 USB ports.
Accelerate what entertains you.
FasTrack technology detects Internet favorites like Netflix and YouTube and automatically prioritizes them for smooth HD streaming.
Advanced Wi-Fi performance.
Up to 300 + 300 Mbps speed with dual 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously. Fast HD streaming with simple setup and superior range-amplifying technology provides best range for large homes.
Stress-free setup.
WD's streamlined CD or browser setup is designed to get you up and running in 3 easy steps.
Technology: Seamless HD entertainment streaming with FasTrack

- Exclusive FasTrack technology delivers smooth high-quality HD streaming to all your connected devices. It automatically recognizes and prioritizes popular services like, Netflix, HuluPlus, Pandora, CinemaNow and YouTube, for more reliable streaming, less hesitation and accelerated performance. You can customize it to recognize other Internet favorites so there's no waiting for your HD entertainment even if it's streaming all at the same time.
Speed that keeps up with you
- With dual-band speeds up to 300 Mbps on the 2.4 GHZ band and 450 Mbps on the 5 GHz band, the My Net N750 delivers fast Wi-Fi speeds for all your connected devices.*

* Maximum wireless performance rate derived from IEEE standard 802.11 specifications. Actual data throughput and wireless coverage may vary based on wireless network capacity, data throughput rate, range and coverage. Performance depends on factors including distance from the access point, volume of network traffic, building materials and construction, operating system used, configuration of wireless products used, interference and other adverse conditions. As used for transfer rate or interface, Megabits per second (Mbps) = 1 million bits per second, Gigabits per second (Gbps) = 1 billion bits per second.
More bandwidth, less interference

- Double your bandwidth with 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously to increase throughput. Additionally, the 5 GHz band offers a dedicated network that streams your entertainment without interference.
Extended coverage

- Range-amplifying technology helps reduce interference and expand wireless coverage to more rooms in your home. Stream your movies, shows, games, videos and music to all the laptops, tablets and smartphones in your home.
4 Gigabit Ethernet ports
- Four Gigabit Ethernet ports make it easy to expand your network with additional connected devices.
2 USB ports
- The convenient USB ports make it easy to add external storage such as My Book or My Passport hard drives, shared printers, scanners and other USB devices to your network.
Software: More control

- My Net Dashboard makes it easy for you to customize, monitor or change your network settings. Access parental controls, Internet security, network name and password, printer and scanner settings, and connected storage drive settings all in one easy view.
Parental controls and Internet security

- Use the available parental controls to limit the type of websites your children can view, set access and time limits for their web access and set Internet security to prevent malware and spyware attacks.
Keep your network up and running

- The included network diagnostics tool monitors your network for you. It shows how many devices are on your network, continually analyzes common network connectivity issues and helps correct them when they occur so you are back up and running quickly.
Share your network with guests
- Set up your own secure wireless hotspot in your home so your guests can wirelessly access your network. Password protection allows you to control access to just wireless web browsing.
Setup Easy setup

- WD's streamlined CD or browser setup is designed to get you up and running in minutes with just a few quick steps. You can set up your router with the included easy setup CD or set it up wirelessly with a browser on any of your connected devices. The intuitive user interface is designed for touch screens, making setting up your router on a smartphone or tablet a snap.
Easily connect and expand your network
- With UPnP, My Net N900 makes it easy to discover and auto-configure other devices on your network to provide the ultimate entertainment experience.
Create your own personal cloud
- Connect WD's My Book Live or My Book Live Duo personal cloud storage device to your My Net HD dual-band router to create your own personal cloud solution within your home network.
Push button setup (WPS)

- Easily connect new devices to your wireless network with the push of a button. It's as easy as syncing your mobile phone to your Bluetooth device, and within seconds you can expand your network to include PCs, smartphones, tablets, and other UPnP enabled wireless devices.
Advanced QoS (WMM)

- In addition to industry-standard Advanced QoS which prioritizes devices, My Net routers feature exclusive FasTrack Plus technology that delivers smart, real-time prioritization of Internet movies, shows, games and video chat for the smoothest possible HD entertainment streaming.
WPA/WPA2, SPI firewall
- We protect your wireless network with WPA/WPA2 and SPI firewall security. Only the data you want gets through, hackers are blocked, and your network is protected.
Antenna amplifiers
- Built into the sleek design of the routers are multiple antenna amplifiers that help boost the router's range so that you get excellent coverage and speed in almost any size home.
IPv6-enabled
- Future-proof your network with support for the latest Internet Protocol technology.
Ideal for
Smooth, accelerated streaming of HD movies, shows, games and more
Smooth, accelerated streaming of HD movies, shows, games and more

description: Bluegrass Soy Sauce is the only microbrewed soy sauce made in the United States. Developed by Matt Jamie, Founder of Bourbon Barrel Foods, it is handcrafted in small batches using only whole Kentucky grown Non-GMO soybeans, soft red winter wheat, and the purest limestone-filtered Kentucky spring water. We ferment and age the soybean mash in re-purposed Kentucky bourbon barrels to develop a taste that is smoky and brothy with hints of oak and a mild sweetness reminiscent of fine Kentucky bourbon.. Each barrel is aged for a year, giving it a full body flavor and aroma. Once it is bottled, each label is hand-numbered by barrel and bottle, which is our nod to the boutique bourbons bottled in Kentucky. It‚Äôs smoky and brothy with hints of oak and a mild sweetness reminiscent of fine Kentucky bourbon. Bluegrass Soy Sauce is a sofi award finalist and has been featured on Bizarre Foods America, America‚Äôs Heartland, and How It‚Äôs Made. Read about Bluegrass Soy Sauce in The New York Times, Southern Living, Garden and Gun and Food and Dining. Find Bluegrass Soy Sauce on the menus of Milkwood (Louisville), 610 Magnolia (Louisville), Bistro 1860 (Louisville), Seviche (Louisville), MOPHO (New Orleans), Husk (Nashville and Charleston), and more.

description: Product Description
OXO Good Grips 5-Inch Utility Knife
Amazon.com

As one of the most versatile knives you'll ever use, this utility knife is a perfect choice for cutting meats, slicing vegetables, or tackling a loaf of bread. The durable, fine-edged blade is hand finished and serrated for heavy-duty jobs and simple ones alike. The soft, rubber nonslip handle makes for sure-placed cuts while absorbing tension and strain away from the hands.

The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip flexible handles on every product. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands, while providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material dishwasher gaskets are constructed of, the handles are slip-proof, wet or dry, as well as dishwasher-safe. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award.
--Laurie Notaro

review.user_review: I love the way dried cranberries taste in a trail mix.  I also love almonds and cashews so this is a pretty tasty combination to me.  I don't like mixes like these with too many ingredients so this one is just ideally suited to my tastes.  These are salty or greasy so you feel like you're eating a healthy snack with these - much better than loading up on chips.  I love that it has the resealable bag so you can eat a few handfuls at a time and then put the bag up while keeping the product fresh.

I think this will just be a personal choice as to what people like.  We went through the bags pretty quickly so they were enjoyed.  It's just a different taste.

description: Solimo Apple & Cinnamon Instant Oatmeal packets are a delicious and convenient way to enjoy hot breakfast cereal. review.user_review: I was supposed ot receive these in the Sesame flavor but I got the Pico instead. I think the family prefers the Pico flavor anyway. All the family likes to sit and snack on these. My husband says the only problem is he sits down and wants to eat the whole bag.  I'd much rather he do that with these than some other snack or cracker.  The Pico flavor has a little kick of spicy flavor but nothing that really burns your mouth. I love the large case and they've lasted surprisingly longer than I expected because it's such a big box.  The bags aren't huge but they aren't extremely oversized for what's inside.  You can stick these in a shoulder bag if you need to. The are good chips. They are a little harder than a trraditional corn chip but that's expected with the gluten free.  The gluten free are healthier and I don't mind the slight difference in texture with a traditional chip.

review.user_review: Need a little kick to your laptop speakers then this is the product for you. I found this very easy to install and I was quickly on my way to enhancing my computer experience. There's not much to say about this other than it's easy to use, very compact with no wires or anything in your way and adds some volume to whatever your doing from gaming to watching videos on youtube. It sits on top of your laptop while connected with a USB cable and its almost like it's a part of your computer. You can even connect your I-Pod to it if you desire. Just be careful to not close your laptop with this on or tilt the top of your laptop to far forward or back as the speaker may fall off. Overall Im satisfied with this product and think you should give it a try.

review.user_review_title: Small - Easily Portable - Great Wireless Keyboard and Touchpad
review.user_review: This is a great wireless keyboard.  You definitely don't have to use this for just connecting to your television.  I think what I like most about it is that it is so portable.  It's smaller than it looked to me in the photo but not too small.  I have a convertible laptop and the keyboard is really small so this is perfect for typing comfortably instead.  It is truly plug and play.  You simply plug the connector into the USB port and it works immediately.  You don't need any technical skills to start using this at all.  The built in mouse is a perfect size and it woks great with no lag.  It reads my fingers well.  My fingers picked this up easily and typing is a breeze.  So far it's great and as I said I love that it's not too large and I can carry around easily. I also like that since I am carrying it around I don't have to carry a mouse around as well.  Having it built in is such a convenience.  I'll update if any reliability issues.

review.user_review:
This unit is a perfect size for someone on the go. I thought it was going to be larger than it is, but I was pleasantly surprised when I received this because it's not too big. Also, it is not too heavy and it's very portable. Setup was super easy. This doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles other than the solar panel for the power, but it is just so handy. It does come with an a/c adapter if you need to charge it that way.

After I quickly setup the Bluetooth, I turned on the music on my iPhone and it was playing immediately. The sound is very good. It's not super loud and that is the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I have a portable Harmon Kardon player that is super loud and the music is pristine and this one just isn't the same in sound quality - the HK costs nearly twice as much though. However, any lack in sound quality is certainly made up for in portability and in ease of use. I've surprised myself because this unit is the one I take now whenever I want to listen to music, because it's just so easy to grab and go. You'll find yourself grabbing and taking it to the car, to the beach, on a hike, to a game, even from room to room, etc. It feels more durable and has a great handle for toting it around. Since it's solar powered, you'll have no worries about purchasing and adding the weight of all those heavy D batteries that usually go with these products. Great product and I'm thrilled to have it. No problems at all.

This is a definite recommend.

description: Et√≥n Rukus Portable Bluetooth Sound System with Solar Panel
Start a Rukus!

The Eton Rukus Solar is a portable Bluetooth sound system with a high efficiency solar panel, so you can play your tunes all day long. Take it out to the park, to a tailgate, or use it at home with this self-powered sound system.
Amplify virtually any media-playing device

With quick one-touch pairing, the Rukus Solar can wirelessly stream your music from any source. Its Bluetooth connectivity with AVRCP (one-touch pairing and control) and A2DP (high quality stereo streaming) support allows you to play music from any Bluetooth enabled smart phone, tablet or computer. It's lightweight and has an integrated handle making it easy to carry around. It also has a USB output to charge most smart phones and mobile devices and its storage net securely protects your device during transport.
Big Sound!

Don't get caught trying to rock out with some mini-speakers! With stereo sound blaring from two full-range speaker drivers, you're able to keep the Rukus playing all day long! Audio comes through crystal clear with the stereo sound and bass boost.
Hold Up! You get MOG too!
Your new Eton Rukus can only get better with 3 MONTHS of FREE music with access to MOG ($30 value). Access code is provided in the box for the primo listening package!
What is MOG?

Discover the Amazon Curated Collection of fine and fashion jewelry. The expansive selection of high-quality jewelry featured in the Amazon Curated Collection offers everyday values that range from precious gemstone and diamond pieces to the latest fashion designs.

The Amazon Curated Collection offers a specialized customer service team that is available seven days a week to answer any product questions before, during or after the purchase. If you‚Äôre not satisfied for any reason, you will receive a full refund and free return shipping within the U.S. if you return your purchase within 30 days.
Find a special gift for a loved one or a beautiful piece that complements your personal style with jewelry from the Amazon Curated Collection.
About Sterling Silver Jewelry
Sterling Silver History

Experts believe that silver alloy, used today as sterling silver, originated in continental Europe in the 12th century. Pure silver was found to be a soft and easily damageable material. When combined with other metals, most commonly cooper, it produced a tougher material that could be heavily relied on. Throughout the next few centuries, sterling silver was used as currency and for household items. It was often used as silverware and became the material used in a proper table setting between 1840 and 1940 throughout the United States and Europe. Because of this popularity, silver companies began to grow. During this craze, companies began to experiment using sterling silver compositions in jewelry, as it was a material that was easy to mold into intricate designs and gave a luxurious look with its metallic finish. Today, sterling silver is widely used in all kinds of jewelry styles and shines as beautifully as other precious metals, with the benefit of affordable pricing.
Sterling Silver Composition

While pure silver can be combined with many different types of metals, sterling silver is created when combining pure silver with copper. Sterling silver jewelry can be composed with different amounts of copper but is most often seen with the .925 stamp, meaning that the composition is of 92.5 percent silver and 7.5 percent copper. This has been found to be a good combination for maintaining the silver's durability without harming its sparkle.
Caring for Your Sterling Silver Jewelry

Silver should not come into contact with harsh household chemicals such as bleach, ammonia, or chlorine. To avoid scratches, store silver in a lined jewelry box or pouch, as it is prone to tarnish as it naturally reacts with sulfur or hydrogen sulfide in the air. Cleaning and wearing silver jewelry regularly will prevent this and help maintain its shine. Immediately upon noticing any discoloration, use a gentle polish made specifically for removing tarnish.

review.user_review:
This is my first experience with fonio, and it was a pleasant surprise. Fonio is an African grain that is very similar to couscous, but significantly smaller.

I tried one packet on the stove, and one in the microwave. The microwave method was much easier, cleaner, and it tasted a little better too, so that's the clear winner in my book. This was heavily spiced, but not in a "hot" way, more in a "flavor" way. This means that you can easily get away with just using water; there's no need for a broth, even though this would be a go-to for a grain like this in most cases. There are a lot of dehydrated veggies in the mix as well that I thought were quite good.

It's a good side dish.

review.user_review:
This is a very nice little docking station for your home or office. You'll want a different setup for a home theater system, where realistically, you need as few "steps" between your television and the source of the media. In this case, the docking station has an HDMI port, but it's meant for office use, as it's resolution and refresh rate are fairly low. This will work pefectly as intended in an office setting, but not for everyone.

Outside of that, the produce is well-designed and feels substantial when you take it out of the box. The stand is also quite sturdy, and the ports work as advertised. This is an ideal solution for a home office, or anyone who needs more ports on their desktop. I wish it were mountable to a desk, but not many seem to be, so I'll give them a pass on that. Great product.

review.user_review:
The mouse functions just fine. It's easy to install with just the dongle, and started working within seconds. It's pretty small, which I like, despite my large hands, because it means it's a lot more portable.

Now for the bad part. When I use this, I find myself asking if the developers could have made a more awkward portable mouse. The shape of the mouse is just a flat curve, with no ergonomic features whatsoever. In other words, it's very uncomfortable for all-day use, and some of the side buttons are very difficult for my thicker fingers to press. For a few dollars more, a logitech mouse would be larger, easier to grasp, and much more comfortable on your hand. I think it's worth the extra money to look elsewhere.

review.user_review:
There's nothing flashy about this backpack, but for the price, are we really going to complain.

I can fit a whole heck of a lot into this backpack, and it's kind of become my daily man-purse where I store all kinds of things: my laptop for work, a spare set of gym clothes and a rolled-up towel, and all of the extra pens, keys, and thing-a-ma-bobs that I seem to need all the darn time. Yes, it certainly holds plenty, and I'm not even stuffing it to capacity, and it's comfortable enough on the shoulders.

The look and feel of the thing make me a little iffy, though. It's plain and boring, which has a certain appeal sometimes, but it also feels...cheap. It's not cheaply made by any standard - mine looks as close to brand new as you can expect from a heavily-used backpack that's thrown around far more than it should have been. Nothing has broken off, twisted, or even shows signs of distress. And yet despite that, the zipper is very cheapy looking and light weight, as are the straps, which are coated with a slip-resistant substance that looks and feels like the residue from a long-ago spill that never seemed to come off the fabric.

Don't get me wrong, I love this thing, I just wish it looked as good as it worked.

Not recommended.

review.user_review_title: These coffees surprised this coffee snob!
review.user_review: And I mean it, I am a coffee snob. I buy green beans from around the world and roast them myself. And they don‚Äôt get ground until right before I‚Äôm ready to pour the water on them. So I am likely to be much more of a critic than most. I will start with the packaging. It came in a plain brown box and this would be clearly meant for giftgiving so the brown box packaging was very disappointing. Inside are multiple packages of coffee from all over the world.  Most of these countries I have sampled many beans, but I haven‚Äôt tried India yet. I thought that they did a great thing by including a postcard from each country that the beans were represented from. And in addition to that they had cupping notes which coffee snob‚Äòs live for! And on the back of the cupping notes there was a history of the coffee for that region of the world. I‚Äôm used to cupping notes talking about butter scotch and coffee and tobacco flavors and chocolate and caramel but there was some flavors that I had never seen before like biscotti.  I normally drink my coffee as a dark roast, but I decided to go outside of my comfort zone and try the India coffee that was rated at a medium roast. With flavors of marzipan? Milk chocolate and raisin.  I was a little disappointed that they came pre-ground, I like getting my beans whole and grinding them myself. But I have to say I thoroughly enjoyed that cup of coffee pre-ground and all!  It was a true medium roast. Many companies that state they have a medium roast it‚Äôs really way too bright for me and I don‚Äôt enjoy it at all, but this would be a true representation of a medium roast and I found the flavors to be very different than what I‚Äôve had before but thoroughly enjoyable. Each pouch is decorated in patterns and designs consistent with the country that they come from which was also very nice. All in all I really enjoyed this set. The price of $44 is not unreasonable, but I will say again that they really need to up their game on the packaging and get away from the plain brown box if they plan on looking for a market of giftgiving. But that‚Äôs really my only critique and I was expecting to really bash this coffee and I really did enjoy it.

review.user_review_title: Perfect for Sous Vide, advanced meal prep, marinades...
review.user_review:
I will start by saying this unit is probably not well suited for the average home use, it's fairly large and would take up a lot of counter space and is quite heavy and not easily toted around.
That being said, there ARE some homes that would benefit from it. If you do a lot of Sous Vide cooking, if you do a lot of advanced food preparation or hunters that like to marinate their meats.
You can vacuum seal liquids with this unit! I have a foodsaver and although I use it constantly, it cannot handle anything with the slightest amount of liquid. Not only does it make a mess, I ended up ruining one unit trying to seal a jar with soup in it with the accessory hose where it sucked up the liquid.
I make a lot of stock...seriously... I'm a bone broth junkie and storing my stock in canning jars in the freezer is a pain on so many levels...the storage room it takes up not the least of it. Knowing that I could vacuum seal my stock and store it flat in the freezer was such a great change for me. I also like to cook soup, stews and chili in bulk and freeze for later use, again the canning jars are a horrible storage solution for the freezer. With this unit I can do individual or family size portions and simply drop the bag in a pot of boiling water to heat it up and there is literally no clean up! The cost savings alone from not having to buy frozen dinners is worth the price, and your food tastes so much better. Placing a marinated steak or chicken in the bag and then freezing made for amazing grilled meats as the marinade really penetrates.
I've also saved money by buying big family packs and then sealing smaller portions that I will use and since it's so easy to add a marinade I rarely ever just plain pack now.
The unit is easy to use, some presets and then you can also do manual. The bags for these machines are less expensive than what my foodsaver uses...I'm not sure why but foodsavers and other similar models can't use the less expensive bags successfully...more cost savings.
Cleaning, the round edges internally make for much easier cleaning.
Price: this is a commercial machine and for that the price is quite reasonable. For a large family or someone who does a lot of Sous Vide or food prep in general it might be worth your consideration.

review.user_review_title: Something to keep them away from YouTube!
review.user_review:
Because this really is a unit meant for kids! I didn't think an 8 year old would be able to set it up but he did! It's compact and very easy to use. I will say, it has to be for kids because the control screen on the front is too small for old eyes to read. It is slow...but your kid will be sitting in front of the unit the whole time watching it develop the project...better than being plastered in front of the boob tube. It comes with everything you need to get started, no need to buy anything else, even a nice supply of filament is included. I can't imagine any kid, boy or girl who wouldn't love this.
I felt the price was reasonable.
